instructions: From any home screen, tap Apps. Tap Settings. Tap General>Accounts & sync . (If using List view, scroll down to 'PERSONAL,' then tap Accounts & sync.) Tap Add account> Email. Tap Other. Enter your email address and password. Tap Manual setup. Select email account type, then tap Next. Tap Next. Enter incoming server information. Verify username and password. If necessary, edit the account name or your name. Tap Done. Tap Next. Enter outgoing server information. Verify username and password. Tap Done. Tap Next.

From any home screen, tap Apps. Tap Settings. Tap General> Accounts & sync . (If using List view, scroll down to 'PERSONAL,' then tap Accounts & sync.) Tap the account you want to delete. Tap the account name at the top of the screen. Tap Menu > Remove account. Tap REMOVE ACCOUNT to confirm, then OK.
